item.title: Shortcodes
item.author: trinhthanhthien6.it@gmail.com (Trịnh Thanh Thiên)
item.description: Markdownify box This is boxmd shortcode Simple box This is **box** shortcode Code tabs Make it easy to switch between different code java javascript 1 System.out.println('Hello World!'); 1 console.log('Hello World!'); Tabs for general purpose Windows MacOS Ubuntu Windows section 1 console.log('Hello World!'); ⚠️Becareful that the content in the tab should be different from each other. The tab makes unique id hashes depending on the tab contents. So, If you just copy-paste the tabs with multiple times, since it has the same contents, the tab will not work.
item.dc:creator: Trịnh Thanh Thiên
